scripts.dev:api: sh -c 'export HOST=${HOST:-127.0.0.1}; export PORT=${PORT:-1999}; echo "[helios] API: http://$HOST:$PORT/api"; npm run -w @helios/api start:dev'
scripts.dev:web: sh -c 'export NEXT_PUBLIC_API_BASE_URL=${NEXT_PUBLIC_API_BASE_URL:-http://127.0.0.1:1999/api}; echo "[helios] WEB: http://127.0.0.1:3000 (if busy, Next will try 3001+)"; echo "[helios] NEXT_PUBLIC_API_BASE_URL=$NEXT_PUBLIC_API_BASE_URL"; npm run -w @helios/web dev'
